studio.description:
If you're wondering why everything seems so usual all of a sudden, it's because you've just walked into the studio. You begin to take stock of what's here.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading west. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an unblocked exit to the south.

laundromat.description:
You arrive in a laundromat. A normal one.

 You make out a table. The table is standard.[if there is something on the s_0] On the table you can make out [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. Hm. Oh well[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

spare room.description:
You find yourself in a spare room. An ordinary one. You begin to take stock of what's here.

 Look over there! a stand. [if there is something on the s_1]On the stand you can make out [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But the thing is empty.[end if]

There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

workshop.description:
You are in a workshop. A standard one.

 You can see a cabinet.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You see a case.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The case contains [a list of things in the c_1]. Now that's what I call TextWorld![end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] What a letdown! The case is empty![end if] You can make out a mantle! [if there is something on the s_2]You see [a list of things on the s_2] on the mantle.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]The mantle appears to be empty.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the south. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

cubicle.description:
You are in a cubicle. An usual kind of place. Let's see what's in here.

 You can see [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] safe.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You see [if c_3 is locked]a locked[else if c_3 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] coffer.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The coffer contains [a list of things in the c_3]. The light flickers for a second, but nothing else happens.[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The coffer is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You can see a chair. [if there is something on the s_3]You see [a list of things on the s_3] on the chair.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

dish-pit.description:
You arrive in a dish-pit. A typical kind of place. You begin to take stock of what's here.

 You make out a board. The board is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_4] On the board you can make out [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4] But the thing hasn't got anything on it. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

kitchenette.description:
You find yourself in a kitchenette. A typical kind of place.



 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked.

sauna.description:
You're now in the sauna. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.



There is an unguarded exit to the north.

shower.description:
Guess what, you are in the place we're calling the shower.



There is an unguarded exit to the south.

vault.description:
You're now in a vault.

 You see a shelf. The shelf is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_5] On the shelf you can see [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5] But the thing is empty.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded.
